--- title: "In class exercise 06" author: "Luo Yuming" date: "septerber 30, 2024" date-modified: "Last-modified" execute: eval: true echo: true freeze: true warning: false --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} pacman::p_load(sf, sfdep, tmap, plotly, tidyverse, Kendall) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} hunan <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "Hunan") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Reading layer `Hunan' from data source `/Users/lucasluo/Desktop/SMU/Courses/Term3 Aug-Dec/ISSS626-Geospatial Analytics and Applications/lucasluo6/ISSS626/In-class-Ex/In-class_Ex06/data/geospatial' using driver `ESRI Shapefile' Simple feature collection with 88 features and 7 fields Geometry type: POLYGON Dimension: XY Bounding box: xmin: 108.7831 ymin: 24.6342 xmax: 114.2544 ymax: 30.12812 Geodetic CRS: WGS 84 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} GDPPC <-read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_GDPPC.csv") ``` ::: ::: {style="font-size:1.5em"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GDPPC_st <- spacetime(GDPPC, hunan, .loc_col = "County", .time_col = "Year") is_spacetime_cube(GDPPC_st) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] TRUE ``` ::: ::: ::: # Computing Gi* ## Deriving the spatial weights ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GDPPC_nb <-GDPPC_st %>% activate("geometry")%>% mutate(nb =include_self( st_contiguity(geometry)), wt= st_inverse_distance(nb, geometry, scale = 1, alpha =1), .before =1) %>% set_nbs("nb")%>% set_wts("wt") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gi_stars <- GDPPC_nb %>% group_by(Year)%>% mutate(gi_stars=local_gstar_perm( GDPPC,nb,wt))%>% tidyr::unnest(gi_stars) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} cbg <- gi_stars %>% ungroup()%>% filter(County=="Changsha") |> select(County, Year, gi_star) ``` ::: ##Mann-Kendall test on Gi ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(data = cbg, aes(x= Year, y= gi_star))+ geom_line()+ theme_light() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex06_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ##Interacive Mann-Kendall plot ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p <- ggplot(data = cbg, aes(x= Year, y= gi_star))+ geom_line()+ theme_light() ggplotly() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} cbg %>% summarise(mk = list( unclass( Kendall::MannKendall(gi_star))))%>% tidyr::unnest_wider(mk) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 1 × 5 tau sl S D varS 1 0.485 0.00742 66 136. 589. ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ehsa <- gi_stars %>% group_by(County)%>% summarise(mk = list( unclass( Kendall::MannKendall(gi_star))))%>% tidyr::unnest_wider(mk) head(ehsa) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 6 × 6 County tau sl S D varS 1 Anhua 0.191 0.303 26 136. 589. 2 Anren -0.294 0.108 -40 136. 589. 3 Anxiang 0 1 0 136. 589. 4 Baojing -0.691 0.000128 -94 136. 589. 5 Chaling -0.0882 0.650 -12 136. 589. 6 Changning -0.750 0.0000318 -102 136. 589. ``` ::: ::: ::::{.column} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ehsa <- emerging_hotspot_analysis( x=GDPPC_st, .var ="GDPPC", k=1, nsim=99 ) ``` ::: # Visualising the distribution of EHSA classes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(data = ehsa, aes(x = classification))+ geom_bar() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex06_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} hunan_ehsa <- hunan%>% left_join(ehsa, by= join_by(County == location)) ehsa_sig <- hunan_ehsa %>% filter(p_value < 0.05) tmap_mode("plot") tm_shape(hunan_ehsa) + tm_polygons() + tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) + tm_shape(ehsa_sig) + tm_fill("classification") + tm_borders(alpha = 0.4) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex06_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
